title: When someone mentions Jhin in boards

replies.body:
Does this mean that I can farm for upvotes just by posting?

4 upvotes per comment, amirite?
Yep
Cool beans.
commenting to make this chain four comments.
C-C-C-C-Combo Breaker!

I see 5 "C's" in that Combo Breaker!

Artless heretic!
That or you'll get -4

Should I up/downvote to ruin the meme?

I think not.
I think we should give Drahcir 16 upvotes. Is that not a thing? Do we have to go all the way to 256 for it to be valid?
We need to get 4444 upvotes.

MWahahaah I have voted all down to 3
some men just want to watch the world burn
Lies you just want to increase the upvote farming. You are playing into a trap giving these people extra upvotes.
I down voted myself just to prove you wrong
Waaaiiitttt a second... By downvoting yourself you guarantee yourself more upvotes. I see your game here
Or I just enjoy the chaos it causes in people to force them to upvote, so they have to meet the 4 upvotes status
Downvoted to 4. ccccc:

4 free upvotes pls, oh wait... here, content, totally original...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
-EDIT- 
I captured your post at it's most perfect...
http://imgur.com/VHkxFjz

Actually, I did. 
http://puu.sh/tybPC/368ad8091b.jpg
4Hrs and 4 votes beat 44 votes, 44 votes and 4 days, now that will be truest perfection.
Oh good, now it's the time to get my all time highest rated comment of 4 likes.
WHY IS THERE FIVE VOTE COUNTERS!?

o: A post not at 4 upvotes. 

BOYS, UPVOTE HIM.

Downvoted to keep the cosmos at balance.

Edit:Upvoted to fix that which was wronged by others

I want to upvote, but this currently has 44 upvotes.

So take this comment instead.
Every Jhin Post Ever
You get it right ?
Every comment four words ...
Just kill me now
I really cannot stop

I know it's off topic (Sort of, since Jhin's getting one too) but are you looking forward to the newly announced Blood Moon Diana skin? If you need proof, go to Surrender@20 or any other LoL news-related site.
Oh yeah I definetly am. Can't wait to see how it'll look like.
Same here, but I also play Jhin so I'm hoping that one turns out good too.
It could turn out better than Diana honestly. His kit just gives too much potential to make awesome VFX.
I'm hyped af for blood moon Jhin. I love playing him, I just hate playing adc right now so I haven't played him much recently.

Its really frustrating with bot lane mages, you just get stunned and die if you don't have summoners up.

I was playing normals against a lux/aurelion sol lane as jhin yesterday and I wanted to die.

**#MakeJhinGreatAgain**
This is perfection now!
It would be a shame if someone made those  4s into 5s
But those are 5 4s in the picture D:
Our performance begins.

I refuse to partake in this.

...shit.

Amidst all the chaos in Gameplay, Jhin M&G posts bring everybody together, and everybody gets x4 upvotes (or downvotes).

Who knew a psychotic gunman who kills in the name of his sick "art" could help bond the LoL community. It really goes to show what sort of people we are.
^ this ^
PERFECTION isn't good enough{{champion:202}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}}
meh here for the upvotes

I upvoted a bunch of people to 4.  Then god intervened.  You see I was about to upvote a 5th person to 4, but I was prevented by the upvote per minute limit.  As such I will only upvote 4 people to their 4th upvote to maintain perfection.
Upvotes, Upvotes everywhere
there were 5 upvotes so i downvoted to make it 4 again.
Had to do the same, a real shame.
http://media.tumblr.com/03f521e64cd8d2e8dccdf76ad4f9efe5/tumblr_inline_mh8686Kr0H1qz4rgp.gif
